    Serializable

    public class ReactiveWebMergedContextConfiguration
extends org.springframework.test.context.MergedContextConfiguration
    Encapsulates the merged context configuration declared on a test class and all of its superclasses for a reactive web application.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
